content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"保護 EPAM 機會及避免利益衝突\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"利益衝突所發生的情況，是當你的個人或私人利益妨礙或看似妨礙了 EPAM 的利益。. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM 有利益衝突的政策很簡單– \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"的機會均屬於 EPAM。\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"你對 EPAM 的忠實義務要求你避免任何與 EPAM 利益產生衝突或似有衝突的關係。你不應該把你的個人利益放在 EPAM 利益之上。你亦需要記住，情況會發生變化，之前看似可接受的的情況可能變成潛在的利益衝突。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"如果您對某種情況是否有利益衝突存有疑問，可以諮詢你的經理或法律部門或合規專員。如果你發現對該情況的諮詢或披露與他人令你尷尬―你最好避免該情形或尋求管理層同意採取其他行動。\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"典型的利益衝突情況有︰\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"由於你於 EPAM 的職位而接受或給予禮品或禮遇；\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"出席某些業務或投資機會；\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"讓家庭或個人關係影響業務決策；\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"出席與EPAM競爭的活動；及\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"擔任董事會成員。\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM 的行為守則對為以上例子提供更深\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"入的剖析︰\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IV. 保護EPAM的機會及避免利益沖突\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"當個人的私人利益幹擾或看似\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"幹擾EPAM的利益時，發生“利益沖突”。當員工、\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"高級職員或董事作出可能令其難以客觀及有效的履行職責的行為或具有可能令其難以客觀及有效的履行職責的利益時，\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"則可能出現利益沖突。當員工、\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"高級職員或董事（或其家庭成員）由於\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"該員工、高級職員或董事在EPAM的職位而獲得不當的個人利益時，也可能產生利益沖突。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM的機會（包括通過使用EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"的財產或信息或您在EPAM的職位發現的機會）屬於EPAM。  您對EPAM的忠誠義務包括避免會與EPAM的利益或您適當履行職責的能力沖突或看似沖突的個人、財務、業務或其他關系，或避免使用EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"的財產或信息或您在EPAM的職位獲取個人利益。  避免出現您似乎有將個人利益置於EPAM利益之上的動機的情況，即使該等情況只是涉嫌產生利益沖突。   當您、您的朋友或家人在EPAM機會中有個人或業務利益時，務必以符合EPAM最佳利益的方式行事。   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"有時，情況會發生變化，先前可接受的機會可能會產生潛在的利益沖突，您需要放棄該機會。  若出現會產生潛在利益沖突的EPAM機會，請向您的經理充分披露該機會及事實，未經適當的EPAM批準，不得參與該機會。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"部分常見的利益沖突領域如下所述。  即使您的情況不屬於這些領域，也仍有可能產生沖突。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"問問自己，相關情況是否會導致或帶來讓您自己或與您有個人關系的人士得益的動機。  如果您不願披露或認為披露會導致尷尬，最好避免該情況或尋求批準。  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a. 接受禮品及招待\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"禮品和商務禮儀會帶來利益沖突的表象。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"尤其是當價值、成本或頻率看似會影響商業決定時。  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"未經事先批準，不得接受禮品或招待，切勿索要禮品或招待。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"例如，如果您獲提供大型高爾夫錦標賽的門票（尤其是同時提供旅行及食宿時），未經適當的批準，您不得接受。  切勿接受客戶或其他業務合作夥伴提供的現金或現金等價物（如，禮品券、信用卡或貸款）。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"非現金低價禮品可以接受。  偶爾的適度餐飲及本地活動可以接受。  但是，如果這些名義禮品變得頻繁或高價或會帶來利益沖突的表象，這些名義禮品也應拒絕或者需要獲得批準。   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"避免將任何客戶或業務合作夥伴置於這樣的境地：他們認為他們必須送禮、提供招待或提供個人恩惠才能與EPAM開展業務。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b. 商業機會及個人投資\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"通過您的工作吸引您的註意的商業機會屬於EPAM，而不屬於您。  這些機會應提供給EPAM，您應予以拒絕，除非您在作出充分披露後已獲得EPAM的批準。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"個人投資（例如，對包括EPAM的競爭對手、客戶或其他業務合作夥伴在內的上市公司進行分散投資的互惠基金）無需披露，不會被視為沖突。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"禁止與EPAM競爭。  如果您對EPAM的競爭對手、客戶或其他業務合作夥伴的個人投資額度足以讓您被視為會以您自己的最佳利益而非EPAM的最佳利益行事，這可能會產生利益沖突。   該等對競爭對手的投資屬於沖突。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"如果該等投資對客戶或其他業務夥伴作出，並且您在EPAM的職位能夠影響EPAM的行動或決定，從而利用EPAM令您的個人投資受益，這也屬於沖突。  切勿作出該等投資。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"如果您有會產生利益沖突的現有投資，或者不確定潛在投資是否會產生利益沖突，您應聯系首席合規官。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c. 個人及業務關系\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"若與家人、朋友、業務合作夥伴或其他人士的個人或業務關系會影響或涉嫌影響您的判斷，該等親密關系也會產生潛在的利益沖突。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"例如：\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"為外部活動利用您在EPAM的職位或任何EPAM資產，或以會形成EPAM發起或支持相關活動的表象的方式利用您在EPAM的職位或任何EPAM資產，也會產生潛在的利益沖突。 \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"您應與您的經理討論潛在沖突，拒絕作出相關活動或尋求批準。 \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"向員工、高級職員或董事或其家人提供貸款或為該等人士的債務提供擔保\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"需要特別關註，未經您經理的許可（經理須獲得首席合規官的許可），\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"不得作出該等行為。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d. 外部雇傭及業務\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"利用屬於EPAM的機會或另行與EPAM競爭或利用公司時間或資產進行的外部雇傭或業務可產生潛在的利益沖突。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"潛在的利益沖突示例：\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"接受EPAM的競爭對手、客戶或其他業務合作夥伴的工作；\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"開設與EPAM競爭或利用您知曉的EPAM的機密信息的企業；\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"獲取或創造您知道EPAM擁有或可能擁有權益的IP權利或獲取您知道EPAM擁有或可能擁有權益的不動產權利或其他資產；或\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"開展不與EPAM競爭但利用公司時間或公司資產或另行幹擾您的工作職責的業務或活動。 \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"e. 理事會成員\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"董事會或咨詢委員會的成員身份可能會帶來潛在的利益沖突，尤其是擔任競爭對手、客戶、其他業務合作夥伴或行業/貿易協會的董事會或咨詢委員會的成員時。  未經充分披露及CEO批準，切勿接受該等任命。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
